about_the_game:
Manor Maze, as you can guess from the name, is a horror game the takes place in a manor that is also a maze.

This manor is composed of 4 mazes, each one has its own mechanic. Use your brain to find it because if you get caught, you will start back at the lowest floor.
Find out why you were brought here and try to find the way to escape, because if you don't the future might not be bright. This very unique place will play with your nerves, try to free yourself, if you can.

Manor Maze is the very first game made by this team of one individual that only wishes to gain experience for the future. Expect a short game but hopefully a scary one

name: Manor Maze

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Those settings haven't been tested yet

short_description: Have you ever dreamed about being trapped in a manor where the architecture is a maze? Understandable, but unfortunately that will be happening. Where each maze has its own mechanic, will you be able to decipher them to free yourself from a place where it seems like you have no allies.
